version_description: Jotalicious now has the option to track decimal values in prices. You can turn this feature on by tapping on the settings icon on the main screen.

This update offers better support for larger screen sizes and lets those of you with 3D Touch peek into the lists from the overview screen. In addition, this update adds the ability to search for an item or list the main list screen and the all items screen respectively.
Design tweaks and fixes to notch things up to 11

Jotalicious 3.0 makes shopping a breeze...
• updated appearance and layout
• a new "Category" screen displays lists of items grouped by the category you've assigned them to
• the item details have a new look with improved ease of use
• tons of tiny improvements

Accessibility improvements
Fixed an issue prevented an updated list color from showing right after changing it
Fixed a glitch that prevented a place name change from showing right after saving it.
The size of the item price will now increase based on your dynamic type preferences.
Added the ability to rename a list or a place from the context menu.

Update for iOS14
• Quickly set the price of an item using 3D Touch
• Sort, share, import and more from the new menu on a list's item screen
• Improved .jot file preview when viewing a saved list in Files
This update restores the ability to delete completed items
